about_the_game:
Hey!Do you want to enjoy snowboarding just at home? Welcome to Red Hoodie Ski Resort!
•Choose a character!
Brother and sister are just arrived at the Red Hoodie Ski Resort. They hope to have a nice holiday here. Help them learn how to ski well by acting one of them!
•Fantastic Experience!
There are two types of tracks for skiers to choose, which have different difficulty. When playing Track1, you need to flexibly use turning skills to avoid touch the red obstacles, or game will be over! And Track2 is crowded with tourists and harmless obstacles which can slower your speed. Be careful about them!
•Leave your name!
Try to create the fastest record! After finishing a game, you can sign your name on the ranking list.(Only for the
second level of each track) Come here and have fantastic snowboarding experience!
•Contact Us!
We hope to add real scene of ski resort into the game, so if you are the manager of a ski resort and have interest in it, please contact us.
